name: Gravity Sketch Sketch File
summary: A GRS file is a 3D drawing created by Gravity Sketch, a 3D design platform available primarily for VR devices. It contains a 3D model or models that a user created in Gravity Sketch. GRS files can be viewed in the VR and iOS (iPad) versions of Gravity Sketch, and they can be exported from Gravity Sketch in several common 3D model formats (for use with other 3D modeling programs).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
